meanings.definition: A sector or division within a larger industry.
meanings.sent1: The subindustries of the tech industry include software development and hardware manufacturing.
meanings.sent2: In the automotive sector, the subindustries range from car manufacturing to parts suppliers.
meanings.sent3: The subindustries of the fashion industry are like different branches on a stylish tree.
meanings.sent4: Just as a puzzle is made of many pieces, the subindustries of an industry come together to create a whole.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the various subindustries can help you understand the complexity of the overall industry.

meanings.definition: The smaller industries that make up a larger industry.
meanings.sent1: Within the entertainment industry, subindustries like film, music, and gaming thrive.
meanings.sent2: The subindustries of agriculture encompass farming, livestock, and crop production.
meanings.sent3: The subindustries of the food industry work together like ingredients in a recipe.
meanings.sent4: Just as a family is made up of individuals, subindustries are the building blocks of a larger industry.
meanings.sent5: Each of the subindustries contributes uniquely to the success of the overarching industry.
